reference: Meijer, Erik  and  Jan  Rouwendal (2005) “Measuring welfare effects in models with random coefficients”, Journal of Applied Econometrics, forthcoming.
description:
Description
a cross-section from 1987
number of observations :  2929
observation :  individuals
country :  Netherland
title: Stated Preferences for Train Traveling

parameters.changez: number of changes for proposition z (z=1,2)
parameters.timez:
travel time  of proposition z (z=1,2) in
minutes
parameters.comfortz:
comfort  of proposition z (z=1,2), 0, 1 or 2 
in decreasing comfort order
parameters.pricez:
price of proposition z (z=1,2) in cents of
guilders
